item.description:
We are inviting expressions of interest for the voluntary role of Social Media Officer, who will also join our Executive Committee at the International Contact Research Network (ICRN). This is an opportunity to help shape how we communicate and connect as an international research community while gaining experience in research communication and digital engagement.

Why Join Us?

This role offers the chance to:

  • Expand your international professional network
  • Build experience in research communication and digital engagement
  • Play a meaningful role in supporting and developing our global research community

You will work closely with our Communications Team and one of our Co-Chairs. We work collaboratively and value creativity, initiative, and new ideas.

About the Role

Social Media Officer

  • Shape, maintain, and moderate our social media presence
  • Lead activity on LinkedIn and Bluesky, with scope to explore additional platforms
  • Collaborate with our podcast, newsletter, and website teams to:
    • Share updates and opportunities
    • Highlight membersâ€™ work
    • Promote events
    • Increase the visibility of our network

Executive Committee Member

  • Attend termly (and occasional ad hoc) Executive Committee meetings
  • Contribute to discussions about future opportunities, events, and network development

The role will begin as soon as possible and involves an initial 12-month commitment, with the possibility of extension.

How to Apply

To apply, please send a brief expression of interest outlining:

  • Your relevant skills or experience
  • Your motivation for applying
